nodes.text: The spaceport tower was a tower that stood by the Coruscant Jedi Temple. It allowed starships too large for the Temple hangars to dock in the Jedi Temple complex.

The tower first appeared in an establishing shot of the 2002 prequel trilogy film Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, though it was not present in a similar shot in the subsequent film released in 2005, Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. The building was identified as a spaceport tower in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations.
